64671.「今度こそ 逃がすかっ！: I won't let you get away this time!

64677.「あ <pc>さんっ。\n 今の…… 見てたでしょう？:
Oh, <pc>. Now... you saw that, didn't
you?

64678.「バッファロンの怨霊は ああやって\n 毎日のように現れて 人を襲ってるの。\n:
The Buffalon Grudge appears every day like
that and attacks people. There's no end to
the number of people who get sick...

64679.「きっと あの怨霊を 鎮めない限り\n アラハギーロは 救えないと思う……。\n:
I'm sure that Al-Ahagiro can't be saved unless
that Grudge Identity is appeased... so I want
to find out who that Grudge Identity is.

64680.「ねえ <pc>さん！\n 私たちが 格闘場の地下のオリから\n 逃がした魔物た:
Hey <pc>! Remember those monsters we
let escape from the cage in the basement of
the arena?

64681.「あの魔物たちは もともと人間なんだから\n バッファロンの怨霊について\n 何:
Since those monsters were originally human, I
think they might know something about the
Buffalon Grudge Spirit.

64682.「だから <pc>さん！\n あの魔物たちを探すの 手伝ってくれない？:
So <pc>! Will you help me find those
monsters?

64683.「ホント！？ ありがとう！\n <pc>さんが一緒なら 心強いわ。:
Really! Thank you! It's reassuring to know
that <pc> is always willing to
help!

64684.「町の外へ よく出かける人なら\n 魔物たちについて 何か 知ってるかも！\n:
If you're out and about, you find out
something about the monsters! Ask around in
the castle town!

64685.「ホント！？ あっ でも……\n <pc>さん 他の人からの頼まれごとも\n い:
Really? Oh, but...<pc> You must be
taking on a lot of requests from other people,
too.

64686.「私 この先の武器庫で 調べものしてるから\n 用事が終わったら 来てくれる？:
I'm going to the armory down the street to do
some research, so when you're done, can you
come by?

64687.「そっか……。<pc>さんしか\n お願いできる人 いないんだけどな……。:
I see... <pc> is the only one I can
ask...

64688.「私 この先の武器庫で 調べものしてるから\n もし 気が変わったら 来てね。:
I'll be in the armory down the street doing
some research, so if you change your mind,
come see me.

64690.「バッファロンの怨霊は あなたも見た通り\n 毎日のように現れて 人を襲ってるの:
The Buffalon Grudge, as you have seen,
appears daily and attacks people. There's no
end to the number of people who get sick...

64691.「きっと あの怨霊を 鎮めない限り\n アラハギーロは 救えないと思う……。\n:
I'm sure that Al-Ahagiro can't be saved unless
that Grudge Identity is appeased... so I want
to find out who that Grudge Identity is.

64692.「私たちが 格闘場の地下のオリから 逃がした\n 元人間の魔物なら あの怨霊につ:
I think the ex-human monsters we let escape from the cage in the basement of the arena would know something about that
vindictive spirit.

64693.「だから <pc>さん！\n あの魔物たちを探すの 手伝ってくれない？:
So <pc>! Will you help me find those
monsters?

64694.「そっか……。<pc>さんしか\n お願いできる人 いないんだけどな……。:
I see... <pc> is the only one I can
ask...

64695.「私 ここで 調べものしてるから\n もし 気が変わったら 来てね。:
I'm here doing some research, so if you change
your mind, come on over.

64696.「……ねえ おじさん。今の ホント！？\n 格闘場から逃げた 魔物たちは\n 今:
Hey, sir. Really? The monsters that escaped
from the arena are now in the Sunshade
Cave?

64697.「んぁ？ ああ……。\n って言っても それっぽい魔物の集団ってだけで\n 確か:
Hmm? Ah... but it's just a group of monsters
that look like that. I'm not too sure..

64698.「うん わかった。おじさん ありがとう！: Yeah, I got it. Thanks, sir!

64699.「<pc>さん。これは 有力な情報を\n 得たみたいだね！ とりあえず\n 日除:
<pc>. Well, it looks like we've got
some promising information! In the meantime,
let's head on down to the Sunshade Cave.

64700.「日除けのほら穴は アラハギーロ王国の\n 南にあるの。\n 私は 先に向かって:
The Sunshade Cave is south of the Kingdom of
Al-Ahagiro. I'll be on my way!

64701.「<pc>さん 来てくれたのね。\n 格闘場から 逃がした子たち いるかなぁ？:
<pc>, I'm so glad you came. I wonder
if any of the monsters I let escape from the
arena are here?

64703.「みんな ひさしぶりだね！\n 前 ベルムドさんに 襲われたときは\n 助けてく:
Hey, guys, it's been a while! Thank you so
much for saving my life the last time Mr.
Bermud attacked me!

64704.「あのねっ。今日は あなたたちに\n 聞きたいことがあって 来たの！:
You know what? I came here today to ask you
guys something!

64705.「今 アラハギーロの城下町に\n バッファロンの怨霊が 現れて\n 町の人たちを:
Right now, in the castle town of Al-Ahagiro,
the Buffalon Grudge has appeared and is
tormenting the townspeople...

64706.「たぶん 格闘場のショーで ベルムドさんに\n 最初に殺されてしまった バッファ:
Probably the Buffalon who was first killed by
Mr. Bermud at the arena.You guys know who
that monster was...

64709.「ベルムドに 最初に殺されたバッファロンなら\n ゴリウス兵士長に 間違いありま:
If the Buffalon was the first monster killed
by Bermud, then it was definitely Captain
Gorius.

64711.「はい……。申し遅れました。\n 私は アラハギーロ兵士団の 兵士長だった\n:
Yes... I'm sorry I'm late. My name is Tajius,
the son of Gorius, the captain of the soldiers
of Al-Ahagiro.

64712.「格闘場から 逃してくださったことには\n みな 感謝しています。\n あなたが:
We are all grateful to you for getting us out
of the arena. Without you, our lives
would be...

64713.「ううん。私 あなたたちが キズつけられるのを\n 見ていられなかっただけだから:
No, it's okay. I just couldn't stand to see
you get hurt.

64714.「それより そのゴリウスさんって たしか\n ベルムドさんに きつく 命令してた:
I think that Mr. Gorius is the one who gave
Mr. Bermud strict orders, right? Can you tell
me about him?

64715.「父は 非常に プライドの高い人でしたから\n ベルムドに 見せ物にされ 殺され:
My father was a very proud man, and I'm sure
his resentment at being made an example of and
killed by Bermud must have been extraordinary.

64716.「元はと言えば 父が まもの使いたちの魔物を\n 戦地へ向かわせ 人間たちの盾に:
The original grudge was born from the fact that my father sent the Monster Master's monsters into battle and used them as shields
for humans...

64717.「セラフィさん！\n 申し訳ありませんが 私をアラハギーロまで\n 連れていって:
Seraphi! I am sorry, but could you take me to
Al-Ahagiro?

64718.「私が 父を説得してみます！\n 父には 自らの過ちを認め 恨みを捨てて\n 天:
I will try to convince him! I want him to
admit his mistakes, put aside his resentment,
and return to heaven...

64720.「<pc>さん。思いがけず\n 心強い味方が現れて よかったね。:
<pc>, it's great for us to
unexpectedly find a reassuring ally.

64721.「もしかしたら タジウスさんがいれば\n 問題が 解決するかも。城下町へ戻って\:
Perhaps if Mr. Tajius were here, the problem
might be solved. Let's go back to the castle
town and see Mr. Gorius!

64727.「……僕が わからないのですか？\n あなたの息子の タジウスです！！: Don't you recognize me? I am your son, Tajius!

64728.「いくら探したって ベルムドは\n もう いないんです！\n どうか 怒りを鎮め:
No matter how hard you look for him, Bermud
is gone! Please, calm your anger!

64729.「……僕は 人を恨んで 我を忘れ 暴れくるう\n そんな父さんの姿は 見たくあり:
I don't want to see you get so angry and lose
your mind so badly that you go on rampages!

64730.「ヒョーッヒョッヒョ！\n そんな安っぽい 親子のメロドラマで\n 私の実験の:
Oh ho ho... Don't interrupt my experiment
with such cheesy father-son melodrama.

64731.「……おや。そこにいるのは あの勇者姫の\n 横にいた…… たしか <pc>。\:
Oh. There you are, beside that Hero
Princess... I think <pc>. It's nice
to see you again.

64732.「せっかく こうして再会できたのですから \n あれから 私の身に起こったことを:
Now that we have a lot to catch up on, let me
tell you a little about what has happened to
me since then.

64733.「あなたがたに 我が研究の集大成である\n 魔勇者を粉砕され 私のプライドは\n:
My pride was shattered when you crushed my
Hero, the culmination of my research.

64734.「ですが おかげで 目が覚めましたよ……。\n あの程度の成果に 満足していたな:
But thanks to you, I've woken up... I'm
ashamed to think now that I was satisfied with
that level of achievement.

64735.「かくして 私は より強い素材を求め\n 偽のレンダーシア中を 探索したのです。:
Thus, I scoured the false Lendersia in search
of stronger test subjects. And finally, I
came across...

64737.「彼がまとう 怨念のチカラは 計り知れません。\n このチカラと 私の技術が合わ:
The power of the grudge he carries is immeasurable. If I can combine this power with my skill, it will be a masterpiece of my
research!

64738.「そして この国を滅ぼすことで それを証明し\n 大魔王マデサゴーラ様に\n 我:
And I will prove it by destroying this country
and offering the best of my research to
Madesagora!

64739.「<pc>。あなたを倒せば ゴリウス君の \n 優秀さは 確かなものとなるはず…:
. If we defeat you, we will be able to confirm the excellence of Gorius and you will be able to cooperate with us in
our experiment!

64741.「ヒョヒョッ？ まだ 人の情が残っているとは\n 計算外です。そんな 生ぬるい感:
Oh? Hm. I didn't calculate that you still have human feelings left in you. I must make adjustments so that all such lukewarm feelings
can be converted into grudges...

64742.「それでは <pc>！\n 再調整ののち また お会いしましょう。\n 次こそ:
Well then, <pc>! Let's meet again
after the readjustment. Next time, I'll be
sure to kill you!

64744.「オマエたち 何者だ！？\n あの怨霊と 話していたようだが\n 何か 関係があ:
Who the hell are you people? You've been
talking to that ghost. What's the connection?

64745.「もしや ヤツを 町に引き込んでいるのは\n オマエたちじゃないのか！？\n 怪:
Are you the ones who've been drawing him into
town? You're the ones responsible!

64748.「安心しろ。今の声は オレの仲間さ。: Don't worry. That voice is my companion.

64750.「勘違いすんなよ。こないだ助けてもらった\n 借りを 返しておきたかっただけだ。:
Don't get me wrong. I just wanted to pay you back for saving my life the other day. Don't just stand there, get out of town while you
still can!

64751.「<pc>さん。\n ひとまず アラハギーロを出ましょう。\n 私たち 先に行っ:
Let's leave Al-Ahagiro for now.
We'll go on ahead.

64753.「さっきは おどろいたね。\n いきなりの 黒幕登場だなんて……。:
I was surprised earlier. The sudden
appearance of the mastermind behind all
this...

64754.「申し訳ありませんでした。\n 私が 父を説得できればよかったのですが……。:
I am sorry. I wish I could have convinced my
father...

64755.「しょうがないよ！ あのヒョッヒョマンに\n 実験とか言って 操られてたみたいだ:
It can't be helped! It's like he was being
manipulated by that wizard, calling it an
experiment or something.

64756.「次は ゴリウスさんをパワーアップさせて\n <pc>さんを 倒す……って\n:
Next he said he would power up Gorius to
take down <pc>....

64757.「このままだと <pc>さんも\n この国の人たちも 危険だわ……。:
If this continues, both <pc> and the
people of this country are in danger...

64758.「でも 剣も 呪文も効かない\n ゴリウスさんの怨霊を相手に\n どうやって 戦:
But how am I supposed to fight against Mr.
Gorius' Grudge Ghost, where swords and spells
don't work...

64759.「セラフィさん！ 私も協力しますから\n 一緒に 方法を探しましょう！:
Seraphi! I'll help you, together we'll find a
way!

64760.「……そうだね！\n ありがとう タジウスさん！:
...I guess you're right! Thank you, Mr.
Tajius!

64761.「あっ。まだ お礼を渡してなかったね。\n 一緒に タジウスさんたちの居場所を\:
Ah. I haven't thanked you yet. Thank you for
working with me to locate Tajius and the
others!

64762.「じゃあ またね <pc>さん！\n 私 タジウスさんと一緒に ゴリウスさんを\:
See you later <pc>! I'll work with
Mr. Tajius to find a way to deal with Mr.
Gorius!

86286.「ホント！？ あっ でも……\n <pc>さん 他の人からの頼まれごとも\n い:
Really? Oh, but...<pc> You must be
taking on a lot of requests from other people,
too.

86287.「私 ここで 調べものしてるから\n 用事が終わったら 来てくれる？:
I'm here doing some research, so when you're
done with your errands, will you come over?
